name: Cossacks II: Napoleonic Wars
description: Cossacks II: Napoleonic Wars sends the player into the heroic XIX century where they assume the role of a commander to take part in the massive historical battles for the supremacy over Europe.

When I saw the mixed reviews I felt I had to post my opinion. If you are a true RTS fan then you'll love this game, probably my favorite for this time period. Yes graphics are dated, but who cares when the stratagy is this good. Graphics take very little if anything away from the game. Units are easy to move and control, moving around the map could be a little better but not a deal breaker. I'll continue to keep this game installed for several more years I'm sure.
